actions.text: On agreeing to the Oberstar amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 291 - 137 (Roll no. 283).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Oberstar.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Oberstar amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 291 - 137 (Roll no. 283).

description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to finalize or implement a Department of Transportation proposed rule to open up U.S. air carriers to a greater share of control by foreign owners.
purpose: An amendment to prohibt any of the funds made available by the Act from being used by the Department of Transportation to finalize or implement the policy proposed in the notice of proposed rulemaking published in the Federal Register on November 7, 2005 (70 Fed. Reg. 67389), or suplemental notice of proposed rulemaking published in the Federal Register on May 5, 2006 (71 Fed. Reg. 26425), in Docket No. OST-2003-15759.
